title: Why So Many Luxury Brands Are Terrible at Ecommerce
excerpt: Until recently, a lack of digital prioritization and desire to control access have led to sub-par luxury ecommerce experiences. Many luxury brands are struggling to improve.

title: Fast, Cheap, and Out of Control: Inside Shein’s Sudden Rise
excerpt: The Chinese company has become a fast-fashion juggernaut by appealing to budget-conscious Gen Zers. But its ultralow prices are hiding unacceptable costs.

title: 'Growing two times faster than the rest of the market': Inside L'Oreal's e-
excerpt: If e-commerce was a market for L’Oreal, then it would be the biggest in terms of market value, worth nearly €5 billion ($5.9 billion).

title: Op-Ed | How Premium Mediocre Conquered Fashion
excerpt: Brands are giving the masses the illusion that they are consuming luxury, when in reality they are doing nothing of the sort, argues Eugene Rabkin.
